subproject.corporate outcome: Support national public administration reform initiatives
subproject.description:
An overall strategic management mechanism for MARD, reflecting implications of increased globalisation, developed within the long-term vision, piloted and submitted to the Minister

Sectoral organisation is unified, streamlined, rational and fully accountable and transparent with clearly defined state management functions, allocated to most appropriate vertical level

New effective models and management mechanisms for enhanced public service delivery to farmers and other actors in the ARD sector developed and piloted, ensuring public service delivery from a wider range of service providers (CSOs, private sector etc)

Informed decision-making and participation enabled for sector actors at all levels in support of the e-government
subproject.title: MARD - MACRO MANAGEMENT
